product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Wallaby Toiletry Kit
long_description: Incredibly lightweight at only 4 oz., the Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Wallaby Toiletry Kit offers 3 zip pockets, light padding and a hanging hook for your travel convenience. Made of of ultralight ripstop silnylon (silicone-impregnated nylon) that resists water, staining and tearing. Lightly padded with perforated EVA foam to protect contents. Translucent fabric on interior pockets allows some visibility for quick identification of items. Stow-away swivel nonslip hook can hang on a doorknob or towel rack. 2-way zipper into main compartment; 3 interior zippered compartments for organization. Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Wallaby Toiletry Kit offers a convenient carry handle and is washable.
short_description: Incredibly lightweight at only 4 oz., the Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Wallaby Toiletry Kit offers 3 zip pockets, light padding and a hanging hook for your travel convenience.
